Description:
Require staffs for a new opening drinking water company in Ajman, United Arab Emirates. Jobs available for the post listed below.UAE experienced salesman for 5-gallon bottled water delivery (door to door sales).
Drivers for 3 ton pickups
Experienced sales executive for outdoor sales.
Salaries are attractive and accommodation is provided.Skills
Skills:
Strong organizational and time management skills to prioritize tasks and meet deadlines.
Demonstrated strong negotiation and persuasion skills to close deals and achieve targets.
Excellent negotiation and persuasion abilities to accomplish sales targets and close deals.
Experience in van sales or related field, ideally in retail sector.
